vege.author: Sawan P.
vege.review: First name comes in my mind when I wish for Mexican Burritos. This place is nice, clean and with completely friendly nature staff. Best in menu for me, as I am vegetarian, Vege Super Burritos. Its really awesome in test and I always carry-out but they have little arrangement for inside eating too.
